transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello, Namaste madam.
Customer: Ji Namaste, kaise hai sir?
Executive: Badhiya.
Customer: Haan, kaunsi se baat kar rahe hai?
Executive: Madam ye JS Electronics se.
Customer: Haan bataiye sir.
Executive: Ye IndiaMART band ho gaya hai, chalu nahi ho raha hai. Ye ye mang raha hai verify email id isko kar rahe hai fir bhi nahi ho raha OTP nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Hmm, okay. Aap Aditya ji baat kar rahe hai, kaun baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: Hmm, mai Vishal baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Accha Vishal unke bete baat kar rahe hai na sir ke.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Accha ek kaam karte ho, hum laptop pe online hai aap laptop pe?
Customer: Haan laptop hai na.
Customer: Laptop hai na to hum aapko ek meeting link bhej rahe hai usko join kijiye aur usko hum karwate hai, thik hai. To aap dekhiyega aapke mail pe aaya hai kya meeting link?
Customer: Ek minute dekhna.

Customer: Aapka ye jo mail id hamare paas registered hai na Vishal karke hai VR343720@gmail.com hai na isse meeting link aaya hoga video meet with IndiaMART team aisa karke aaya hoga dekhiyega.
Customer: Ek minute dekho.

Customer: Accha ye bataiye ye aapke yaha weekly off hota hai kya, chutti hoti hai kya kisi din?
Customer: Haan ho jati hai ek do din ki. Kaunse kaunse parso madam aayi thi ki nahi jo kaam karti hai parso?
Customer: Nahi wo madam nahi aayi thi unki chutti ho gayi thi is char mahine se.
Customer: Parso ya haan?
Customer: Char mahine chutti ho gayi thi unki abhi tabiyat kharab ho gayi thi unki.
Customer: Parso nahi aayi thi wo, accha. Haan haan.
Customer: Actually maine unko call kiya tha thoda samjhane ke liye service kis tarike se use karna hai to wo keh rahi thi ki hum office me nahi hai to wahi humne socha aapse ek bar confirm kare ki wo sahi keh rahi hai ki nahi.
Customer: Haan nahi dikkat nahi hai wo abhi office me do teen ke liye chutti pe gayi thi ab to aa gayi hai office me. Haan aap ek bar wo link ko join kijiye pehle isko hum thik karte hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai madam ek minute.
Customer: Accha Vishal sir aap bhi service use karte hai ya aap nahi dekhte IndiaMART?
Customer: Mai nahi dekhta, mai nahi dekhta.
Customer: Abhi aap nahi dekhte pehle dekh rahe the na aap?
Customer: Haan pehle ab do ladke aur hai unko bhi join karna hai isi me.
Customer: Haan to join karwaiye unko mai samjhati hu kaise use karna hai actually aapke yaha se service bilkul use ho nahi raha hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Hai na to kuch IndiaMART se kuch kaam wam aaya tha ki nahi sir?
Customer: Haan kaam to aa raha hai.
Customer: Aa raha hai na kuch aa raha hai matlab profit ho raha hai ki nahi?
Customer: Haan sahi profit hoga ab ye do teen din se call hi nahi hui hai.
Customer: Haan to nikalta hai ye nahi hai. Udhar bhi jata hai na. Sir ek bar humne aapse baat kiya tha ki IndiaMART se direct aap website kyu nahi banwa lete apni company ka?
Customer: Website banwa dijiye.
Customer: To IndiaMART aapka website bana dega aur website bana ke us website ko direct IndiaMART pe hum usko highlight karenge. Aur ye jo gmail wala mail id aap use karte hai na gmail ki jagah aapki company ke naam pe mail id jaise sales@jselectronics yani ki jo banda service use kar raha hai usko sales wala mail id de dijiye admin@jselectronics purchase@jselectronics.
Customer: Ek minute rukiye.
Customer: Ek bar login kijiye ha login kijiye.
Customer: Haan IndiaMART to login kar diya maine isme laptop me login hai.
Customer: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Ek minute ek ladke ko line pe le raha hu. Ye bhi ye dekhta hai IndiaMART ko.
Customer: Le lijiye aur usko join kariye pehle link ko join kariye mai wait kar rahi hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- IndiaMART account is not working.

- Facing issue with OTP and email verification.



Resolution:

- Executive sent a meeting link to resolve issue.

- Suggested creating a company website through IndiaMART.

- Suggested using company-specific email IDs instead of Gmail.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join the meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- technical issue, email verification, website, email id
